english.segment1: In the name of the father, in the name of the Son. In the name of the Spirit, Lord we come. Gathered together to lift up your name. To call on our Savior, to fall on Your grace.
english.segment2: Hear the joyful sound of our offering. As Your saints bow down, as Your people sing. We will rise with You, lifted on Your wings. And the world will see that .
english.segment3: Our God saves, our god saves. There is hope, in Your name, Jesus
english.segment4: In the name of the father, in the name of the Son. In the name of the Spirit, Lord we come. Gathered together to lift up your name. To call on our Savior, to fall on Your grace.
english.segment5: Hear the joyful sound of our offering. As Your saints bow down, as Your people sing. We will rise with You, lifted on Your wings. And the world will see that .
english.segment6: Our God saves, our god saves. There is hope, in Your name. Mourning turns to songs of praise. Our God saves, our God saves
english.segment7: Hear the joyful sound of our offering. As Your saints bow down, as Your people sing. We will rise with You, lifted on Your wings. And the world will see that .. And the world will see that .. And the world will see that .
